languages.text: "Что вы! Подобная праздность мешала бы нести бремя служения Императору. Лишь в воистину великие дни, как сегодня, фонтан исторгает благородный напиток. К тому же даже самые крепкие слуги не могут качать насос днями напролет".

"By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."
languages.original_text: "Что вы! Подобная праздность мешала бы нести бремя служения Императору. Лишь в воистину великие дни, как сегодня, фонтан исторгает благородный напиток. К тому же даже самые крепкие слуги не могут качать насос днями напролет".

traits.locale_text: "Of course not! Such frivolous excess would impede us in bearing our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as to day, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

"Of course not! Such frivolous excess would impede us in bearing our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as to day, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

"By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

"By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

"By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

"By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

languages.text: “当然不是！如此奢靡的行为，只会妨碍我们侍奉帝皇。只有像今天这样真正隆重的日子，喷泉才会喷出这种适合尊贵宾客的饮品。再说，即便是最强壮的仆人，也没办法连续抽上好几天的水泵。”
languages.original_text: "By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

traits.locale_text: “当然不是！如此奢靡的行为，只会妨碍我们侍奉帝皇。只有像今天这样真正隆重的日子，喷泉才会喷出这种适合尊贵宾客的饮品。再说，即便是最强壮的仆人，也没办法连续抽上好几天的水泵。”

languages.text: 「滅相もございません！このような軽薄で過剰な贅沢は、皇帝陛下へのご奉仕という重責を果たすうえで妨げとなりましょう。噴水がこの高貴な酒を流すのは、まさに本日のような真に特別な日だけなのです。それに、どれほど屈強な使用人であっても、何日も続けてポンプを動かし続けることはできません」
languages.original_text: "By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

traits.locale_text: 「滅相もございません！このような軽薄で過剰な贅沢は、皇帝陛下へのご奉仕という重責を果たすうえで妨げとなりましょう。噴水がこの高貴な酒を流すのは、まさに本日のような真に特別な日だけなのです。それに、どれほど屈強な使用人であっても、何日も続けてポンプを動かし続けることはできません」

languages.text: «¡De ninguna manera! Es un despilfarro frívolo que nos impediría cumplir nuestro deber al servicio del Emperador. Únicamente en fechas señaladas, como la de hoy, se permite que brote este noble elixir de la fuente. Además, ni siquiera el más recio sirviente podría bombear el surtidor constantemente».
languages.original_text: "By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

traits.locale_text: «¡De ninguna manera! Es un despilfarro frívolo que nos impediría cumplir nuestro deber al servicio del Emperador. Únicamente en fechas señaladas, como la de hoy, se permite que brote este noble elixir de la fuente. Además, ni siquiera el más recio sirviente podría bombear el surtidor constantemente».

languages.text: "Kesinlikle hayır! Böylesi lüzumsuz bir israf, İmparator'a hizmet vazifemizi yerine getirmemizi engellerdi. Yalnızca bugün gibi gerçekten önemli günlerde çeşmeden bu asil içeceği akıtırız. Ayrıca en kuvvetli hizmetkârların bile pompayı günlerce çalışır tutması mümkün değildir."
languages.original_text: "By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle hayır! Böylesi lüzumsuz bir israf, İmparator'a hizmet vazifemizi yerine getirmemizi engellerdi. Yalnızca bugün gibi gerçekten önemli günlerde çeşmeden bu asil içeceği akıtırız. Ayrıca en kuvvetli hizmetkârların bile pompayı günlerce çalışır tutması mümkün değildir."

languages.text: « En aucun cas ! De tels excès frivoles entraveraient l'accomplissement de notre devoir envers l'Empereur. La fontaine ne coule de ce noble breuvage qu'à l'occasion d'événements exceptionnels, comme c'est le cas aujourd'hui. En outre, même le plus robuste de nos serviteurs ne pourrait actionner la pompe plusieurs jours de suite. »
languages.original_text: "By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

traits.locale_text: « En aucun cas ! De tels excès frivoles entraveraient l'accomplissement de notre devoir envers l'Empereur. La fontaine ne coule de ce noble breuvage qu'à l'occasion d'événements exceptionnels, comme c'est le cas aujourd'hui. En outre, même le plus robuste de nos serviteurs ne pourrait actionner la pompe plusieurs jours de suite. »

languages.text: "Auf keinen Fall! Ein derart frivoler Exzess würde uns an der Ausübung unserer Pflicht für den Imperator hindern. Der Brunnen spendet nur an wirklich grandiosen Tagen wie heute dieses edle Getränk. Abgesehen davon könnten selbst die robustesten Diener die Pumpe nicht mehrere Tage lang bedienen."
languages.original_text: "By no means! Such frivolous excess would impede us in carrying out our burden of service to the Emperor. It is only on truly great days, such as today, that the fountain pours forth this noble beverage. Besides, even the sturdiest of servants could not work the pump for days on end."

traits.locale_text: "Auf keinen Fall! Ein derart frivoler Exzess würde uns an der Ausübung unserer Pflicht für den Imperator hindern. Der Brunnen spendet nur an wirklich grandiosen Tagen wie heute dieses edle Getränk. Abgesehen davon könnten selbst die robustesten Diener die Pumpe nicht mehrere Tage lang bedienen."
